subject: Sports Injuries
Knees
Surgery and Surgeons
Baseball
lead_paragraph: A torn A.C.L., like that sustained by Mariano Rivera, is a relatively rare injury in baseball. But there appears to be little that would prevent him from pitching again.
snippet: A torn A.C.L., like that sustained by Mariano Rivera, is a relatively rare injury in baseball. But there appears to be little that would prevent him from pitching again.
